Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to requiring sign language interpreters during live broadcast press conferences during a declared state of emergency
Summary: Requires sign language interpreters during live broadcast press conferences during a declared state of emergency.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring sign language interpreters during live broadcast press conferences during a declared state of emergency
